MAN.TITLE: vdopen

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: A string, the video filename to be read.

DESCRIPTION.P: vdopen open a video, but it does not read frames from the data. Please use im=vdgetframe(n) to get a frame from the n'th opened video file. Remember to close the opened file using vdclose(n) or vdcloseall().
